Find out all information about your browser.

This online tool allows you to get the most detailed information about your browser and its settings. Our service is free and does not require any registration.

This web application defines and displays detailed information about your browser: its name, version,, JavaScript status, Cookies status, current language, current size of the browser window and a list of installed plug-ins. All the information is calculated automatically and displayed just above this text. It is determined based on the analysis of special headers that the browser sends to the site each time you open the page.

The main purpose of this webpage is to help you get the information about the browser installed on your device. The name and version of the browser is defined in the first place. At the top of the information list you will see the browser icon and its version. Service is able to identify and analyze information on the following browsers: Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera, Opera Mini, Yandex browser, Internet Explorer, Safari, Netscape, Konqueror, SeaMonkey, as well as on a number of less-known browsers with numerous assembly options and modifications.
